Judul: LITERATURE REVIEW ON MEDICINAL PROPERTIES AND PHYTOCHEMICAL STUDIES OF  CARICA PAPAYA
Abstrak:
Carica papaya Linn is commonly called betik in Malaysia, and it belongs to the family of Caricaceae. 
The different parts of papaya possess excellent medicinal properties for the treatment of various 
ailments. Papaya is known for numerous pharmacological activities due to phenolics, flavonoids and 
alkaloids as the essential phytochemicals. Further, many commercial products obtained from different 
plant parts are available and utilized for various purposes. This review mainly focuses on the various 
phytochemicals present in other parts of C. papaya, their pharmacological activities and also the 
applications of the commercial and clinical drug products derived from those parts of Carica papaya 
plant. The feasibility criteria for this study are different parts of C. papaya, the phytochemical content 
and their pharmacological activities. For writing this review paper, online scientific databases were 
used, for instance, PubMed, Google Scholar, Scopus, Science Direct and ResearchGate. The sources 
was limited to research journals published in the last ten years, from January 2010 to April 2021 to 
detect valid reports, studies and investigations. As the outcomes, Carica papaya produces latex rich 
in papain (a major proteolytic enzyme), phenolics, flavonoids, and alkaloids as the major 
phytochemicals responsible for the various pharmacological activities such as anti-dengue, 
antibacterial, antifertility agent and antioxidant. The literature study concluded that C. papaya can be 
developed as an alternative medicine for different disease prevention and therapeutic targets.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Dr. apt. Muhamad Insanu, S.Si., M.Si.
Kata Kunci: Carica papaya, Caricaceae, pharmacological activities, phytochemical, medicinal  properties
